formatDescription: The Variant Call Format (VCF) specifies the format of a text file used in bioinformatics for storing gene sequence variations.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: Variant Call Format v4
internalSignatures.note:
BOF: ##fileformat=VCFv4
We currently only distinguish by major version number, but it may be desireable to distinguish between minor version too. 

Specifications: https://github.com/samtools/hts-specs
